Class MedicineCSVOperator

java.lang.Object
CSV.CSVoperator
CSV.MedicineCSVOperator
public class MedicineCSVOperator extends CSVoperator
This class provides methods for managing medicine records in a CSV file. It extends the abstract class CSVoperator and implements functionalities for reading, updating, and modifying the medicine records based on different user roles.

The CSV file is expected to contain medicine data, and the class allows the following operations:

  • Reading the file contents based on user role.
  • Adding a new medicine record (placeholder method).
  • Updating specific medicine information (placeholder method).
  • Deleting a specific medicine record (placeholder method).
  • Updating the CSV file for an admin user, including adding new data.

The data in the CSV file is structured with columns for each medicine record. The class handles different functionalities based on the role of the user (admin or non-admin).

  • Constructor Details

    • MedicineCSVOperator

      public MedicineCSVOperator()
      Constructor that initializes the file path for the medicine CSV file. The default file path is set to "./Medicine_List.csv".

  • Method Details

    • readFile

      public ArrayList<String> readFile(String id, int role)
      Reads the contents of the CSV file based on the user role.
      Specified by:
      readFile in class CSVoperator
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user (not used in this implementation for role 3).
      role - The role of the user. If the role is 3, the user is an admin, and the ID is not required. For role 2, the data is fetched based on the user's permissions.
      Returns:
      A list of strings containing the data from the file, or an empty list if no data is found.

    • addLineToFile

      public boolean addLineToFile(List<String> dataAdd)
      Placeholder method for adding a new medicine record to the CSV file. Currently, this method does nothing but should be implemented to add a new line to the file.
      Specified by:
      addLineToFile in class CSVoperator
      Parameters:
      dataAdd - A list containing the new medicine record data.
      Returns:
      true if the new record is successfully added; false otherwise.

    • changeSpecificInformation

      public boolean changeSpecificInformation(String id, ArrayList<Integer> changesIndex, ArrayList<String> changes)
      Placeholder method for changing a specific block of data in the CSV file. Currently, this method does nothing but should be implemented to update specific fields.
      Specified by:
      changeSpecificInformation in class CSVoperator
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the medicine record to be changed.
      changesIndex - A list of indices representing the columns to be updated.
      changes - A list of new values for the specified columns.
      Returns:
      true if the information was successfully updated; false otherwise.

    • deleteSpecificLine

      public boolean deleteSpecificLine(String id)
      Placeholder method for deleting a specific medicine record from the CSV file. Currently, this method does nothing but should be implemented to remove the specific line.
      Specified by:
      deleteSpecificLine in class CSVoperator
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the medicine record to be deleted.
      Returns:
      true if the record is successfully deleted; false otherwise.

    • updateCSVForAdmin

      public boolean updateCSVForAdmin(ArrayList<String> dataStore)
      Updates the CSV file for an admin user, including adding new data. The method reads the existing data, appends the provided new data, and writes it back to the file.
      Parameters:
      dataStore - A list of strings representing the new data to be added to the file.
      Returns:
      true if the update is successful; false otherwise.
